entitlement_1.entitlement_description: MS3 will react to any issue in a prod environment within 24 hours, inside normal support hours.

entitlement_2.entitlement_name: Unlimited Online or Email Ticket Creation
entitlement_2.entitlement_description: The ability to make an unlimited amount of tickets for MS3 developers to work on.

entitlement_3.entitlement_description: The integrations will be checked daily for any issues.

entitlement_4.entitlement_description: Runbooks will be frequently updated with the latest information.

entitlement_5.entitlement_name: Resolve All Issues with Mulesoft Connectors
entitlement_5.entitlement_description: MS3 developers are Mulesoft experts that will resolve all connector issues

entitlement_6.entitlement_description: While creating API's in Mulesoft, their corresponding anypoint processes with be kept up to date.

entitlement_7.entitlement_description: Support of the production of applications in Anypoint Studios.

entitlement_8.entitlement_description: MS3 can leverage its close connection with Mulesoft to get quick, direct support when needed.

entitlement_9.entitlement_description: Support is limited to normal business hours of 9 AM - 5 PM EST.

entitlement_10.entitlement_description: A maximum of 14 hours to be spent on direct support per month.
